conversations.body_text: ​  Hello, your order has been dispatched and is expected to arrive for you on the 29th .  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045784692744

Hello, your tracking keeps saying the item is overweight. Is it going to be on time?

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
Hi James Hare,  Sorry, we'll check for you.

Thank you.

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
​  In the unlikely event of an accident, we will reship your order using UPS Express.

I am getting a bit desperate for these as my other pedals have broken. Please let me know as soon as possible

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
Hi James Hare,     We've resent the UPS for you. https://t.17track.net/en#nums=1ZJ455510403915910

Thank you very much

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

Hi
What's going on with my order? First one there was a problem with, you said last Friday it had been dispatched with ups and it's still saying it's in China and not collected by ups. This morning it's now saying there is a tracking error. I ordered your best set of pedals with haptics and paid another £30 for express delivery and I still do not have them.

Please advise what is happening. This is not good customer service.


James

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

I've not heard from you. Please refund my money. Such a shame. I was really excited about your pedals. I'll buy some somewhere else.

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
Hi James Hare,     Sorry for the hassle, your package is expected to arrive on the 4th, here's the link to your logistics tracking. https://t.17track.net/en#nums=1ZJ455510403915910

So this is the 3rd package you've had to send? Not really looking good for Simsonn as a company is it

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
Hi James Hare,    We were going to ship it to you on Saturday using UPS Express and it was our warehouse associate who missed it, so I apologize that.

I have received my order but I am missing the 3 linear haptic units and the power supply! Yet another mess up from you. Please send them urgently!

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

Hi James Hare,     They are shipped separately, here's a link to the logistics of the other parcel, which is expected to arrive for you on the 9th.  https://www.track718.us/zh-CN/detail?nums=SF6045784692762

Ok.  Not overly impressed by that but ok.
Also, your website says your brake pedal has a 200kg brake sensor but your instructions say 140kg? I purchased these because they had a 200kg sensor? Photo attached

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

Is anyone going to reply to this?

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

Am I being ignored?

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

Hi James Hare,  I apologize for not getting back to you in time! Our sensors support a force of 200kg, but our elastomers suggest a maximum force of 140kg, of course it's fine to go over that, but be sure to change to the hardest blue elastomer.

Hi,

I am having nothing but trouble with your pedals. My brake pedal keeps showing that it is operating when I'm not touching it. I've tried recalibration etc and it's still doing it and it's causing me huge issues when trying to race. Please either tell me how to fix it or send me a new brake pedal urgently. Video attached showing what the fault is

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

I have narrowed it down further. It is the control box. If I disconnect all of the pedals, the same fault in the games is appearing where it is showing brake force and that's without pedals connected.

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

Hi James Hare,    Hello, this email was handled by multiple people and was accidentally marked as pending, so it was not seen and addressed in time. Please download the VKB JoyTester tool from Google to check whether the Rx axis is interfering with the pedals, and send me a video of the pedal test.  In addition, please use SIMSONN Manager 2.1.1, click Restore on the interface, then click Save, and replug the USB cable to see if the issue is resolved. If the problem persists, you can try Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → pedals-firmware → pedals-proxultra.sfu. This will disable the 4th axis, which may be causing the interference. Normally, only the X, Y, and Z axes are needed.     https://drive.google.com/file/d/1UPkeOHREyALtCtNmL87a2WnUDZV0Gx_b/view?usp=drive_link

What does the rx axis do? I will check it this evening or tomorrow.

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

Hi James Hare,   Previously, the RX axis was used for the handbrake, but in the new control box the handbrake port has been removed. Since the RX axis has not yet been disabled in the software, you may see the RX axis jittering. Once you disable the RX axis, it will no longer affect device binding in iRacing or other games.
Hello, has your issue been resolved? Should you require further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact our support team. We shall gladly resend any necessary parts for you.
